  • Method Details

    • getCurrMeteorIdx

      public int getCurrMeteorIdx()
      Retrieves the index of the current meteor.
      Returns:
      the index of the current meteor as an integer

    • getDiceResult

      public int getDiceResult()
      Retrieves the result of the dice roll.
      Returns:
      the result of the dice roll as an integer

    • isRolled

      public boolean isRolled()
      Determines whether the dice has been rolled in the current state.
      Returns:
      true if the dice has been rolled, false otherwise

    • getPlayerStates

      public List<Integer> getPlayerStates()
      Retrieves the list of player states.
      Returns:
      a list of integers representing the current states of the players

    • compareFirePower

      public void compareFirePower(Player player, List<Coordinates> batteries, List<Coordinates> doubleCannons) throws InvalidStateException
      Compares the firepower of the given player with the opponent's firepower and updates the game state accordingly based on the comparison result.
      Overrides:
      compareFirePower in class GameState
      Parameters:
      player - the player whose firepower is being compared
      batteries - a list of battery coordinates to be used by the player; can be null
      doubleCannons - a list of double cannon coordinates to be used by the player; can be null
      Throws:
      InvalidStateException - if the action is not allowed for the given player in their current state

    • rollDice

      public void rollDice(Player player) throws InvalidStateException
      Executes the roll dice action during the attack phase for a specified player. It determines the outcome of the dice roll and checks whether the meteor attack hits any ships, updating player states accordingly.
      Overrides:
      rollDice in class GameState
      Parameters:
      player - the player attempting to roll the dice during the attack phase
      Throws:
      InvalidStateException - if the dice roll is attempted in an invalid state or by an unauthorized player

    • chooseBattery

      public void chooseBattery(Player player, int x, int y) throws InvalidStateException
      Allows the player to choose whether to neutralize an attack using a battery or to take the hit.
      Overrides:
      chooseBattery in class GameState
      Parameters:
      player - the player making the choice
      x - the x-coordinate of the battery to use, or -1 if the player decides to take the hit
      y - the y-coordinate of the battery to use, or -1 if the player decides to take the hit
      Throws:
      InvalidStateException - if the player is not in a state where they can choose a battery

    • fixShip

      public void fixShip(Player player, List<Coordinates> coordinatesList) throws InvalidStateException
      Fixes the ship of the given player by repairing the specified tiles. This method checks if the player is allowed to perform the fix operation and updates the game state based on the legality of the ship after the fix.
      Overrides:
      fixShip in class GameState
      Parameters:
      player - the player who is attempting to fix their ship
      coordinatesList - a list of coordinates representing the ship tiles to be repaired
      Throws:
      InvalidStateException - if the player is not allowed to fix their ship at this time

    • getReward

      public void getReward(Player player, boolean acceptReward) throws InvalidStateException
      Allows the specified player to decide whether to accept or decline a reward after defeating an opponent, provided the game state allows this action. If the player accepts the reward, their in-game credits and position are updated.
      Overrides:
      getReward in class GameState
      Parameters:
      player - the player who is deciding whether to accept the reward
      acceptReward - true if the player accepts the reward, false if they decline
      Throws:
      InvalidStateException - if the player is not in a valid state to receive the reward, or if the action is not allowed

    • triggerNextRound

      private void triggerNextRound()
      Advances the game to the next round by updating the current meteor index and player states. If all meteors have been addressed, transitions the game to the next state.

    • isAll

      private boolean isAll(int state, List<Integer> list)
      Determines whether all elements in the given list are equal to the provided state.
      Parameters:
      state - the integer value to compare against each element in the list
      list - the list of integers to check
      Returns:
      true if all elements in the list are equal to the specified state; false otherwise

    • isFirstWaitingForShot

      public boolean isFirstWaitingForShot(Player player)
      Checks if the specified player is the first player in the list of players whose state is currently set to WAIT_FOR_SHOT.
      Parameters:
      player - the player to check
      Returns:
      true if the specified player is the first player in the WAIT_FOR_SHOT state, false otherwise

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect(Player player)
      Overrides:
      disconnect in class GameState

    • FORCE_OPPONENT_FIREPOWER

      public void FORCE_OPPONENT_FIREPOWER(int val)

    • updateView

      public void updateView(View view, Game toDisplay) throws IOException
      Updates the given view with the current state of the provided game object.
      Overrides:
      updateView in class GameState
      Parameters:
      view - the view instance that should be updated
      toDisplay - the game object containing the state to render on the view
      Throws:
      IOException - if an input or output exception occurs during the view update

    • updateStateController

      public void updateStateController(ViewController controller, Game game)
      Overrides:
      updateStateController in class GameState
